item.title: The LG G Flex2 provides a greater amount of curved excellence
item.description:
Source: LG. LG Electronics (LG) introduced the G Flex2, the newest iteration of its curved smartphone, at the 2015 International CES. The first G Flex received praise for its unique design and innovative approach. A year later, the G Flex2 improves upon its predecessor with an enhanced design, increased speed, and added user convenience. The LG G Flex2 features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 810 processor for faster performance, making it the first smartphone to officially utilize this technology...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-lg-g-flex2-provides-a-greater-amount-of-curved-excellence/
